steps.name: Creating Inwarranty Job with Create Job API
Setting up the BaseURI, Content Type as Application/JSON and attaching the SensitiveData Filter for a role and attaching payload
Getting the Property Value from the config file
Getting the Auth token for the role

parameters.name: paylaod
parameters.value: CreateJobPayload[mst_service_location_id=1, mst_platform_id=2, mst_warrenty_status_id=1, mst_oem_id=1, customer=Customer[first_name=Chetan, last_name=AG, mobile_number=7090191744, mobile_number_alt=, email_id=agchetan18@gmail.com, email_id_alt=], customer_address=CustomerAddress[flat_number=D 404, apartment_name=Vasant Galaxy, street_name=Bangaru nagar, landmark=Inorbit, area=Mumbai, pincode=411039, country=India, state=Maharashtra], customer_product=CustomerProduct[dop=2026-01-19T16:56:00.501733610Z, serial_number=84620302988448, imei1=84620302988448, imei2=84620302988448, popurl=2026-01-19T16:56:00.501834298Z, product_id=1, mst_model_id=1], problems=[Problems[id=1, remark=Battery Issue]]]
